Boise_City.Discovery Center of Idaho:
Discovery Center of Idaho is an interactive science center in Boise, Idaho located at 131 W. Myrtle St. The Discovery Center of Idaho's mission is to inspire lifelong interest and learning in science, technology, engineering and math.


== Exhibits and Events ==
The Center's exhibition floor is filled with nearly 200 exhibits including the following:
Centripetal Wheel - Get this wheel spinning fast enough and watch as the stuffed animals cling to the outer cylinder wall.
